snippet.title: MAIA Release Trailer
snippet.description:
Maia is a deeply simulated hard sci-fi base building game. Establish a colony on a dangerous primordial alien world. 15% off on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/252250/Maia/

After years of work, it's finally ready. The new campaign is in and the last of the bugs are getting polished down. Maia will launch 1800UTC on Friday November 23rd (Earth time)

http://maiagame.com
